DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the weight loss effect of lorcaserin during and at the end of 1 year of treatment in overweight and obese patients.
DOC.brief_title: BLOSSOM: Behavioral Modification and Lorcaserin Second Study for Obesity Management
DOC.detailed_description: Randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, parallel-group assessment of the effects of lorcaserin hydrochloride during 52 weeks of administration to overweight or obese male and female volunteers aged 18 to 65 years inclusive.
DOC.criteria: Overweight and/or obese men and women with a body mass index (BMI) 30 to 45 kg/m2 with or without a comorbid condition (e.g., hypertension, dyslipidemia, CV disease, glucose intolerance, sleep apnea), or 27 to 29.9 kg/m2 with at least one comorbid condition. Ability to complete a 1 year study Pregnancy Diabetes mellitus (type I, II or other) History of symptomatic heart valve disease Serious or unstable current or past medical conditions
